title: SAMSUNG Series 4 59 cm (24 inch) HD Ready LED TV  (UA24K4100ARLXL)

product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.

product_description.Wide Color Enhancer: With the use of an algorithm, Samsung's Wide Color Enhancer technology renders improved image quality by highlighting hidden details and enhanced colors.
product_description.Create your Own Entertainment Space: Connect multiple devices to your TV through this TV's HDMI ports to view different content. You can now create your own multimedia entertainment centre right at your home.

review:
super product.. picture & sound quality is so good with joy plus features.
fast delivery. I got the product within two days of order. I am satisfied with Samsung LED TV.

Awesome TV. It has 2 USB ports and 2 HDMI ports. The USB supports hard drives upto 1 TB(Not tested for Hard Drives greater than 2 TB).All the USB ports and the HDMI ports work perfectly.You can use HDMI port to connect TV to your PC or Laptop so that you can enjoy your Laptop Content on your TV
(HDMI cables of different sizes are available on Flipkart at very affordable prices). There is also an audio out port so that you can connect any speaker to your TV via aux cable.

Got the TV delivered the very next day. Exchange and Delivery process was quick and hassle free.
You just have to call SAMSUNG CUSTOMER CARE for TV installation. You have to pay additional installation charges upto RS. 450

superb tv.. value for money
tv sound is not much better..picture quality is superb you watch normal pictures fills like HD pictures
I geave him.. 4.5 stars only half stars for sound

Bought it during diwali sale.
Quick delivery with prompt installation.
Tv is great for viewing movies etc in small room.
I have attached all the ports and using them like usb for pendrive, av for cctv, hdmi for cable.
No problem at all switching between these modes.
Only problem is few ports are behind the tv and few at side, if all ports would have been at side, it would be more useful, as the ports behind hide away and are non usable.
Also with screenshots and audio recording it becomes all the more fun and useful.
Would definitely recommend buying this tv.

I got the TV at 10500. Screen clarity is awesome . With set top box, sound is OK but with external Hard disk/Pen drive, sound is on the lower side (though that's also dependent on movie sound quality). Can play 1080p video flawlessly. Can play all the format with USB port. Two HDMI and two USB port available with this model.
